00108 /* Hashtable used to cache the hostname, accessed by their IP addess */
00109 hash_table_t            * ht_ip_name ; 
00110 extern nfs_parameter_t    nfs_param ;
00111 unsigned int              expiration_time ;
00112 
00113 
00114 
00130 unsigned long int ip_name_value_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00131 {
00132   return (unsigned long int)(buffclef->pdata) % p_hparam->index_size ;
00133 } /*  ip_name_value_hash_func */
00134 
00135 
00152 unsigned long int ip_name_rbt_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00153 {
00154   /* We use the Xid as the rbt value */
00155   return (unsigned long int)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00156 } /* ip_name_rbt_hash_func */
00157 
00171 int compare_ip_name(  hash_buffer_t * buff1, hash_buffer_t * buff2 )
00172 {
00173   unsigned long int xid1 = (unsigned long int)(buff1->pdata) ;
00174   unsigned long int xid2 = (unsigned long int)(buff2->pdata) ;
00175   return (xid1 == xid2)?0:1 ;
00176 } /* compare_xid */
00177 
00178 
00192 int display_ip_name( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str ) 
00193 {
00194   unsigned long int ip_name  = ntohl( (unsigned long int)(pbuff->pdata) ) ;
00195   
00196   return sprintf( str, "%x : %u.%u.%u.%u", 
00197                   (unsigned int)ip_name, 
00198                   ( (unsigned int)ip_name & 0xFF000000 ) >> 24, 
00199                   ( (unsigned int)ip_name & 0x00FF0000 ) >> 16,
00200                   ( (unsigned int)ip_name & 0x0000FF00 ) >> 8, 
00201                   ( (unsigned int)ip_name & 0x000000FF ) ) ;
00202 } /* display_ip_name */
00203 
00204 int display_ip_value( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str )
00205 {
00206   nfs_ip_name_t  * pnfs_ip_name ;
00207 
00208   pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)(pbuff->pdata) ;
00209 
00210 
00211   return sprintf( str, "%s", pnfs_ip_name->hostname ) ;
00212 } /* display_ip_name */

00217 
00233 int nfs_ip_name_add( unsigned        int ipaddr,
00234                      char          * hostname  )
00235 {
00236   hash_buffer_t       buffkey  ;
00237   hash_buffer_t       buffdata ;
00238   nfs_ip_name_t     * pnfs_ip_name  = NULL ;
00239   struct hostent    * hp ;
00240   unsigned long int   local_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00241   int                 length = sizeof( local_ipaddr ) ;
00242   
00243 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00244   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00245   BuddySetDebugLabel( "nfs_ip_name_t" ) ;
00246 #endif
00247 
00248   pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( nfs_ip_name_t ) ) ;
00249 
00250 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00251   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00252   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00253 #endif
00254 
00255 
00256   if( pnfs_ip_name == NULL ) 
00257     return IP_NAME_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00258   
00259   /* I have to keep an integer as key, I wil use the pointer buffkey->pdata for this, 
00260    * this also means that buffkey->len will be 0 */
00261   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ; 
00262   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00263 
00264   /* Ask for the name to be cached */
00265   if( ( hp = gethostbyaddr( (char *)&local_ipaddr, length, AF_INET ) ) == NULL )
00266     {
00267       Mem_Free( (void *)pnfs_ip_name ) ;
00268       return IP_NAME_NETDB_ERROR ;
00269     }
00270   
00271 
00272   /* I build the data with the request pointer that should be in state 'IN USE' */
00273   pnfs_ip_name->ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00274   strncpy( pnfs_ip_name->hostname, hp->h_name, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00275   pnfs_ip_name->timestamp = time( NULL ) ;
00276   
00277   buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_ip_name ;
00278   buffdata.len = sizeof( nfs_ip_name_t ) ;
00279   
00280   if( HashTable_Set( ht_ip_name, &buffkey, &buffdata ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00281     return IP_NAME_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00282   
00283   /* Copy the value for the caller */
00284   strncpy( hostname, pnfs_ip_name->hostname, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00285   
00286   
00287   return IP_NAME_SUCCESS ; 
00288 } /* nfs_ip_name_add */
00289 
00302 int  nfs_ip_name_get( unsigned int ipaddr, char * hostname )
00303 {
00304   hash_buffer_t        buffkey ;
00305   hash_buffer_t        buffval ;
00306   int                  status ;
00307   nfs_ip_name_t      * pnfs_ip_name ;
00308   unsigned long int    local_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00309   
00310   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ;
00311   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00312   
00313   if( HashTable_Get( ht_ip_name, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00314     {
00315       pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)buffval.pdata ;
00316       strncpy( hostname, pnfs_ip_name->hostname, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00317 
00318       status = IP_NAME_SUCCESS ;
00319     }
00320   else
00321     {
00322       status = IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND ;
00323     }
00324   return status ;
00325 } /* nfs_ip_name_get */
00326

00328 
00340 int nfs_ip_name_remove( int ipaddr )
00341 {
00342   hash_buffer_t        buffkey , old_value ;
00343   int                  status = IP_NAME_SUCCESS;
00344   nfs_ip_name_t      * pnfs_ip_name  = NULL ;
00345   unsigned long int    local_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00346 
00347   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ; 
00348   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00349 
00350    if( HashTable_Del( ht_ip_name, &buffkey, NULL, &old_value ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00351     {
00352       pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)old_value.pdata ;
00353       Mem_Free( (void *)pnfs_ip_name ) ;
00354     }
00355   else
00356     {
00357       status = IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND ;
00358     }
00359 
00360    return status ;
00361 } /* nfs_ip_name_remove */

00364 
00376 int nfs_Init_ip_name( nfs_ip_name_parameter_t  param ) 
00377 { 
00378   if( ( ht_ip_name = HashTable_Init( param.hash_param  ) ) == NULL )
00379     {
00380       DisplayLog( "NFS IP_NAME: Cannot init IP/name cache" ) ;
00381       return -1 ;
00382     }
00383 
00384   /* Set the expiration time */
00385   expiration_time = param.expiration_time ;
00386 
00387   return IP_NAME_SUCCESS;
00388 } /* nfs_Init_ip_name */
00389 
00390 
00391 int nfs_ip_name_populate( char * path  )
00392 {
00393   config_file_t       config_file ;
00394   config_item_t       block;
00395   int                 var_max ;
00396   int                 var_index ;
00397   int                 err ;
00398   char              * key_name ;
00399   char              * key_value ;
00400   char                label[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00401   unsigned int        ipaddr ;
00402   unsigned long int   long_ipaddr ;
00403   nfs_ip_name_t     * pnfs_ip_name ; 
00404   hash_buffer_t       buffkey ;
00405   hash_buffer_t       buffdata ;
00406 
00407 
00408 
00409   config_file = config_ParseFile( path );
00410 
00411   if( !config_file )
00412    {
00413      DisplayLog( "Can't open file %s", path ) ;
00414 
00415      return IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND ;
00416    }
00417 
00418    /* Get the config BLOCK */
00419   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( config_file, CONF_LABEL_IP_NAME_HOSTS ) ) == NULL )
00420     {
00421       DisplayLog( "Can't get label %s in file %s", CONF_LABEL_IP_NAME_HOSTS, path ) ;
00422       return IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND ;
00423     }
00424   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00425     {
00426       /* Expected to be a block*/
00427       return IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND;
00428     }
00429 
00430   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00431 
00432   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00433     {
00434       config_item_t item;
00435     
00436       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00437       
00438       /* Get key's name */
00439       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00440                                       &key_name,
00441                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00442         {
00443           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00444                   var_index, label ) ;
00445           return ID_MAPPER_NOT_FOUND ;
00446         }
00447 
00448       ipaddr = inet_addr( key_value ) ;
00449       long_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00450 
00451 
00452       /* Entry to be cached */
00453       if( ( pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( nfs_ip_name_t ) ) ) == NULL )
00454           return ID_MAPPER_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00455 
00456       /* I build the data with the request pointer that should be in state 'IN USE' */
00457       pnfs_ip_name->ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00458       strncpy( pnfs_ip_name->hostname, key_name, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00459       pnfs_ip_name->timestamp = time( NULL ) ;
00460 
00461       buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_ip_name ;
00462       buffdata.len = sizeof( nfs_ip_name_t ) ;
00463 
00464       /* I have to keep an integer as key, I wil use the pointer buffkey->pdata for this,
00465        * this also means that buffkey->len will be 0 */
00466       buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)long_ipaddr ;
00467 
00468       buffkey.len = 0 ;
00469 
00470 
00471       if( HashTable_Set( ht_ip_name, &buffkey, &buffdata ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00472         return IP_NAME_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00473 
00474     }
00475 
00476   /* HashTable_Print( ht_ip_name ) ;*/
00477   return IP_NAME_SUCCESS ;
00478 } /* nfs_ip_name_populate */

00494 void nfs_ip_name_get_stats(  hash_stat_t * phstat )
00495 {
00496   HashTable_GetStats( ht_ip_name, phstat ) ;
00497 } /* nfs_ip_name_get_stats */
